tisCardPack:PhasedBurningBlood.NAME: Phased Burning Blood
DESCRIPTIONS: [#0000ff]Global.Replaces #rBurning #rBlood. At the end of combat, heal 3 HP.

tisCardPack:PhasedRingOfTheSnake.NAME: Phased Ring of the Snake
tisCardPack:PhasedRingOfTheSnake.FLAVOR: The ring for all those worthy.
DESCRIPTIONS: [#0000ff]Global. Replaces #gRing #gof #gthe #gSnake. Every second turn draw an extra card.

tisCardPack:PhasedCrackedCore.NAME: Phased Cracked Core
DESCRIPTIONS: [#0000ff]Global. Replaces #bCracked #bCore. Channel 1 Dark at the start of each combat.

tisCardPack:PhasedPureWater.NAME: Phased Pure Water
DESCRIPTIONS: [#0000ff]Global. Replaces #pPure #pWater. Add 1 #yMiracle to your hand on the second turn of every combat.

tisCardPack:WideShield.NAME: Wide Shield
DESCRIPTIONS: If #yTaunting an enemy, reduces the #yTaunt damage multiplier by half.

tisCardPack:ProtectiveRune.NAME: Protective Rune
DESCRIPTIONS: #yInsanity effect's chance is decreased from 3% to 1% per stack. #pCan #ponly #pspawn #pif #pthere's #pan #pally #pWatcher #ppresent.

tisCardPack:RunicEgg.NAME: Runic Egg
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you receive a card through trading, upgrade it.

tisCardPack:Paperwork.NAME: Paperwork
DESCRIPTIONS: You can now trade 2 times per rest site.

tisCardPack:ChaliceOfLife.NAME: Chalice Of Life
DESCRIPTIONS: Revival is now a free action at Rest sites. When reviving an ally, heal them an additional 50% of their max HP.

tisCardPack:PartyBag.NAME: Party Bag
DESCRIPTIONS: When you pick up this relic, give all your teammates 1 random shop relic.

tisCardPack:MagicalThorns.NAME: Magical Thorns
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer trade at rest sites.

tisCardPack:BoundRing.NAME: Blood-Bound Red Ring
DESCRIPTIONS: If you're about to take lethal damage, forward it to the highest HP ally in the room that would survive it if they exist.

tisCardPack:InscribedMirror.NAME: Inscribed Mirror
tisCardPack:InscribedMirror.FLAVOR: Now would you look at that?
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, select and obtain a copy of any ally's card.

tisCardPack:DrainingRing.NAME: Energy-Draining Yellow Ring
DESCRIPTIONS: X cost cards now use up to 1 Energy from other players in the room.

tisCardPack:MagicDust.NAME: Shot Glasses
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you use a potion, a random ally in the room uses it as well.

tisCardPack:RepairChip.NAME: Medical Chip
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, remove ALL your remaining [E] and heal a random ally for the amount of [E] removed.

tisCardPack:GoldRing.NAME: Gold-Plated Silver Ring
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an ally gains gold, store 10 gold in this relic. On right-click gain ALL gold stored and use up this relic.

tisCardPack:ParasiticGrowth.NAME: Parasitic Growth
DESCRIPTIONS: On death apply 3 Vulnerable and 3 Weak to all monsters, and deal damage equal to your max HP.

tisCardPack:UndeadBranch.NAME: Undead Branch
DESCRIPTIONS: The first ally exhausted card every turn is added to your hand and costs 0. Does not apply to Curse or Status cards.

tisCardPack:Alembic.NAME: Alembic
DESCRIPTIONS: If all allies end their turn with 0 energy, gain 1 energy at the start of your next turn.

tisCardPack:Watermelon.NAME: Watermelon
tisCardPack:Watermelon.FLAVOR: Grown in the cracks of the Spire
DESCRIPTIONS: [#0000ff]Global. Gain 10 Max HP on pickup.

tisCardPack:BlackPearl.NAME: Black Pearl
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon reviving an ally, heal 10 HP and gain 50 gold.

tisCardPack:KleinBottle.NAME: Klein Bottle
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever 40 cards are played by allies, deal 20 damage to all enemies.

tisCardPack:GoldenFlame.NAME: Golden Flame
DESCRIPTIONS: When a monster is spawned, apply #ytiscardpack:Golden_Flame to them.

tisCardPack:DefectivePowerCore.NAME: Defective Power Core
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a room, apply 1 #yStrength and 1 #yDexterity to all allies.

tisCardPack:ScoutsBadge.NAME: Scout's Badge
DESCRIPTIONS: If you're the first person to enter a combat, apply 2 weak to all enemies.

tisCardPack:GoldenCertificate.NAME: Gold Certificate
DESCRIPTIONS: [#0000ff]Global. At the end of each combat add 75 Gold to your rewards. This amount is reduced whenever you or your allies lose HP by the amount of HP lost.

tisCardPack:ScalesOfFate.NAME: Scales of Fate
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase all buffs and decrease all debuffs received from allies by 1.

tisCardPack:BackupBattery.NAME: Backup Battery
DESCRIPTIONS: First time you lose [E] because of your allies each turn, gain [E] .

tisCardPack:RedSpeaker.NAME: Red Speaker
tisCardPack:RedSpeaker.FLAVOR: Might not be a good choice.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat, typing 'Look at me' in the chat will Taunt ALL enemies for one turn.

tisCardPack:KeyOfHecate.NAME: Hecate's Key
tisCardPack:KeyOfHecate.FLAVOR: A look into the mystic arts.
DESCRIPTIONS: If dead, replace your current deck with a ghost deck. You can play 3 cards from that deck each turn.

tisCardPack:MutualRespect.NAME: Mutual Respect
tisCardPack:MutualRespect.FLAVOR: Is that a Gunfire Reborn reference???
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat gain 1 Strength, 1 Dexterity, and 1 Focus for every connected ally that has this relic.

tisCardPack:AscendersRage.NAME: Ascender's Rage
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you're resurrected, lose 10 MAX HP and permanently gain 3 Strength, 3 Dexterity, and 3 Focus.

tisCardPack:MysteriousGift.NAME: Mystery Gift
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon Trading, this becomes a random Rare relic.

tisCardPack:Skillbook.NAME: Skillbook
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card that is not of your player class, gain 2 Block.
